title: Shampoo-Free: A DIY Guide
description:
Shampoo-Free: A DIY Guide to Putting Down the Bottle and Embracing Healthier, Happier Hair by Savannah Born

Overview: Learn about the hot beauty trend that's changing the way we think about our hairÃ¢â‚¬â€and improving the way it looksÃ¢â‚¬â€in the first-ever book about the shampoo-free movement.

Parabens, sulfates, methylparaben, sodium laureth sulphate . . . yuck. Join the growing movement of women and men everywhere who are ditching their expensive addiction to chemical-laden shampoos and going shampoo-free.
At first the idea of going shampoo-free might seem radical, or even a little icky, but this beauty secretÃ¢â‚¬â€that's long had a cult following online and been featured in the New York Times, Marie Claire, Elle, and elsewhereÃ¢â‚¬â€is gaining traction big time
